page.title: 01TRADE A Supermarket
page.content: Fine Fare is part of Associated Foods. Fine Fare at Hadrian Lodge West was built in 1983.It covers 22,000sq metres,on one level.It was built on a new estate where there are no other shops.The rates there are lower than they are near the town centre.Every day they get deliveries of some of the thousands of products they sell.These are stored in the warehouse at the back of Fine Fare.Head Office in Washington decides almost all matters of trading. About 13,000 customers use the store each week.The busiest times are Thursday and Friday nights.165 people work in the store.The idea of"Pack Your Own"came from Canada.It is popular because it is cheaper and you can buy small quantities,but the store has to be careful of the Health Regulations.
